Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style, Grand or Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice with top of foot; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; traces of two added white bands above rosette with alternating added red and white petals in tondo; exterior: two streaky brown bands.
Curator's comments: The exterior and interior decoration are consistent with the Mature Animal Style, Grand and Simple Animal Style.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0687) (phase 2)
